subject: Lil Willie Experience ❤️
message: Like many of you, I felt a bit suspicious about buying a Puppy on line. That thought has been erased with Puppy Spot. This deal went down beautifully from the get-go . From the moment of purchase, all the way to delivery night ( and yes, that thought was erased too ) it was safe. Special shout- out to Dalton & Clay , as they too, made it all a nice delivery as they were happy for us too , I was kept updated from the very beginning to the actual meeting. They called him Cody and that was nice, but to me this little Yorkshire Terrier was re-named “ Lil Willie “ He came to me healthy & very alert . He had been very well taken care of, I could tell. Thank- You Puppy Spot for this experience that changed my mind about how things could be, this was a beautiful one. Most of all, Thank You, for Lil Willie.❤️

name: Cindi P.
subject: Would like more communications
message: For the most part everything was fine when we made the initial purchase but after that I found the communication was lacking. It’s disappointing I wanted to have just a little bit of information regarding where the puppy was with potty training such as did they use a pad, outdoors or a litter box. I never got a response. Quick to get the money but once that is secured, the communication could be better. It would be nice to have some information from the breeders so we can best prepare for our puppy’s arrival. We just got our puppy last night and I’m very happy with her.

name: Kamila W.
subject: The process was great and

name: Debbie H.
subject: Happiness all around!
message: Our little dachshund is all we could have asked for! She is precious and she has fit in so easily which showed us that she was treated well and like family at the breeders first! The whole adoption was so on top of each and every process taking place to bring the adoption to fruition! They are so in tune with keeping a very close watch on breeders integrity, puppies health, and the final step of bringing the precious cargo to us well cared for! They are easy to reach by phone for all the questions you may have! I never felt like I may have chosen the wrong company and that says a lot these days with so many scams being perpetrated . They even work with a pet insurance company that they trust that helped so much in making sure Daisy is properly insured. I would not hesitate to endorse this company!

subject: Spanky finds a new home.
message: Thanks to everyone at PuppySpot for making this experience amazing. Our little Spanky is fantastic and arrived on schedule in wonderful shape. A special shout out to Premier puppy transport. Dale and Gary made sure that our puppy was in perfect condition when they transferred him to us. Our experience was wonderful and we were kept in the loop all along the way. Thanks again.

subject: First Time Online Purchase

I'm so happy to have found PuppySpot they were so friendly, professional and were with me all the way until my Puppy was delivered. My puppy is beautiful, healthy and energetic, keeps me going. Thank you PuppySpot I'm telling everyone about your website and how great you guys are.

subject: We had a great experience
message: We had a great experience start to finish with the wonderful drivers Nate and Gary. We love Rain who we now call Rainey Queen of our house. The only issue we have is when asked to get more information on Rainey from the breeder no one from puppyspot ever got back to us . Since she was already 6 months I wanted to know some of her habits. I also took her to the vet 2 days after we got her and found out her puppy shots should have started at 6 weeks but were started at 2 weeks and we have to redo them .. the best connections we had were from the transport people . We had to delay pick up for a week due to the hurricane and they were in contestant contact.

subject: Kate # 770032

Everything was good. We received our puppy Kate # 770032, on October 10th via transport and we love her already. The drivers were super nice and informative. There was a video of Kate on PuppySpot playing outside that was taken down. I would love to have that video, PLEASE! 
Thank you, 
Bonnie

He kept me informed and up to date on everything. She is a bit skittish, but she is the cuddliest dog I've ever had. A week in, and she's adjusting really well. She's adorable and getting along better each day. We love her so much and are extremely happy with her.

name: Michelle C.
subject: We love our dog so
message: We love our dog so much! The process was excellent. There was not stress involved. We had a little problem with communication with the delivery service. They did not have my cell number, so they were not able to get a hold of me. Finally, the driver called his manager to get my cell # and called me right when they were at the meeting spot. That was the only stressful point in this process. We didn't know what to do at the meeting spot, what kind of car, where in the shopping center where we supposed to wait, hoping this wasn't a scam, it was a little scary, but everything worked out! I would definitely use them again if the price was right. Thank you for our new addition to the family! SHE LOVES HIM!

name: Becky W.
subject: Tucker
message: Puppy spot was very supportive and always available to answer any questions I had or willing to find an answer if possible.. My breeder, not so much. They were very difficult to reach and very vague with any answers to questions I had. The meet up was rated, not so good, as a smelly puppy was handed through the car window with some paperwork and a baggie full food thrown at us. It was a dreadful experience. The poor puppy had tear stains, shaking and stinking. We were happy to get him away from there. “Tucker” has since adjusted very well and is a very playful happy puppy, in need of a good grooming. He is a little bigger than we expected, but every inch is loved. Here is to a long and happy life with your new family “Tucker”.

name: Chris A P.
subject: My Puppy Purchase from PuppySpot
message: It was an enjoyable experience from start to finish, I was very happy I went with PuppySpot. The pet selection process was easy, no glitches or snags, the folks I worked with explained everything and were very helpful answering my questions. Once I selected my puppy, I received updates from the vet and the pet transportation crew. Waited about two weeks or so and received information on the location of the delivery. The drivers communicated the location and arrival time; they kept me updated with arrival eta status the whole time. I met them at the assigned location, we exchanged information to verify, and I picked up my little buddy. He was in great shape so I could tell they took very good care of him. I would definitely recommend PuppySpot to anyone looking to purchase online.

subject: No response
message: All good, but I never got a call back from anyone when I called and asked if our Puppy was used to being crated. I called twice, left a message and I still haven’t heard from you guys. I would have called the owner/breeder myself but I didn’t have any contact info. We felt a little betrayed cause you got our $ immediately and I only asked for one question to be answered.

subject: Scamp (now Oliver) experience
message: Had the perfect experience with puppyspot and the transporters! I am now the proud mom of a beautiful Corgi boy! He's very smart and very loving and fun!

name: Raelan A.
subject: Great puppy, inhumane transport option, nightmare customer service
message:
The reason for this one star review is because of my experience with puppy spot. My experience with the actual breeder was great and we love our new puppy so much. She’s perfect! This is our second puppy that we got through Puppy Spot. Everything went great with our first one (about 2.5 years ago), he was delivered to us by plane (in cabin with attendant) and then a driver brought him directly to our apartment. We didn’t request this transport option, it was just what was automatically provided. 

With this second puppy, the transport fee was about the same (about $700). I was told we would have to pick him up in a Target store parking lot about a 10-15 minute drive from our home. This was fine, but seemed odd so I started asking questions. I found out that this puppy would be coming by ground transport and the driver would have many puppies and many stops so had to pick an easier location to not slow down the route. And our puppy would be in her crate on this trip for 5 days. FIVE DAYS IN A CRATE!! The American Humane Society recommends having puppies in a crate for a maximum of four hours. And she would only be let out once every 12 hours for a few minutes while they changed the newspaper in her crate. She would not be allowed outside at any point in this five days. So - an energetic little puppy just taken from her home would be locked in a crate for 5 days mostly sitting in her own excrement.

There was no way I was letting this happen so I called puppy Spot for other options. They offered an option to fly her with an attendant, which would cost $2000, or else I could fly and pick her up myself. 

I chose to fly to come get her (4 flights in one day for a round trip from California to Arkansas and back). I sent over my proposed travel plans before booking, the breeder agreed to the date and time, and Puppy Spot told me to go ahead and book. After my flights were already booked, PS contacted me to tell me that the breeder was no longer available that day and we needed to switch to a new day. Since I had non refundable flights I said this wasn’t possible. I was back and forth with various people from PS with this and was repeatedly told this was somehow my fault and I was responsible for covering any costs for booking new flights. It was so stressful and went on for days. Finally, PS agreed to cover the cost to change the flights (about $250), so I switched the trip to a new day. 

A few days after getting back home with our new puppy, I had not received the $250 reimbursement so I texted in the chat we’d been discussing this in. The person who responded had no idea what I was talking about. So I called PS and they said they had no record and no notes of this. This happened multiple times in the past as well where it felt like I was starting from scratch each time I talked to someone new. And each time I was told in some way how this was my fault. Eventually they reviewed the text chat history and issued the reimbursement. But it was a fight and a hassle every step of the way. What a nightmare. And of all the stress, the worst was knowing that had I not asked any questions, our sweet little puppy would have been locked in a crate for 5 days before getting to us.

name: Jenna R.
subject: Very well done
message: Everything about my adoption went beautifully. Lots of communication, the transportation was very convenient and professional, and my new baby is perfection.

name: Natacha A.
subject: Never again
message: There was no way to get info on the puppies I was looking at online. They are crazy expensive. The puppy I bought is scared of everything!! I grew up with all kinds of animals - my dad has a barn. I have NEVER seen a non-playful puppy. The van that he was delivered in stunk so bad I had tears in my eyes - & I was at the drivers side - not where the puppy was. It was also Freezer cold in there. I don't believe that they take good care of the puppies. The puppy will NOW receive all the love & security they failed to provide. And they don't give you any travel dates untill you buy Insurance from their partner company. Just in it for the money not the love of animals - it is a shame.

name: Linda R.
subject: George was a five
message: George is wonderful! My entire experience with puppy spot was a five from my first picking him, paying and communication though to the silver Mercedes he was delivered in.

name: Shayne D.
subject: An amazing experience!

They go above and beyond to make sure I had answers to all my questions, which made me feel good about my decision to go with them. They respond extremely quickly to emails, and handled all the transportation for me (something I chose to pay for). All I had to do was show up at the appointed location and collect my new family member. Thanks, Puppy Spot!

name: Marie U.

is all good after you get over the sticker shock ;)

Also, the delivery method was odd in that we had to meet their delivery van from Premier Pets in a Home Depot parking lot. But overall, we’re happy that we have our new puppy. Communication is fantastic throughout both with Puppyspot And Premier Pet Transport who actually transported our fur baby to get her close to home for pick up. Premier Pet Transport keeps you totally up to date with everything, even if they are arriving a few minutes early etc. Our drivers for transporting our new precious baby were Chuck and Skyler and they were wonderful and very kind. This was Just the most wonderful experience all around. Thank you Gina from Puppyspot, all the fabulous reps we were in communication with and Chuck and Skyler from Premier Pet Transport for bringing us together with such a precious blessing, we are so appreciative

subject: Excellent service, great delivery, very
message: Excellent service, great delivery, very good communication. Love our little Yorkie.

name: Jim B.
subject: Jade our Maltipoo
message:
From the first day on Feb 29th when we decided to buy Jade. Puppy Spot was great. They text me right away and then we spoke in the phone. This was at 10pm. They kept me up to date on Jade and the whole process. The communication with the people from Puppy Spot was excellent. Jade was a little small to travel so we had to wait until she was 12 weeks old for her safety. During that time we received updates thru text and phone calls reassuring us that Jade was doing well, and the process was moving along. We received Jade on April 10th. She was suppose to arrive at the meeting place at 9:30 pm but i received at text from Premier Pet that they were running early and we could pick up Jade at 8:45 pm. We only had to drive 1 hour to the pick up place. When we were handed Jade we were concerned that she would be upset with the long ride or being separated from her mom and family. Not the case. She was a bundle of energy and even cuter that the pictures. The breeder must must have been working with her because she could fetch a ball and just loves being around new people. 
 I highly recommend Puppy Spot for you next puppy. 
Thank You
JIm B

Linda did change it to our cell numbers, however some how it didn't get thru to the transportation team. We did manage to get in touch with them, and Shiloh was delivered to a well-lit parking lot just off the interstate relatively near our home. He was delivered by a couple of nice gentlemen who made it an easy transfer. We would definitely recommend Puppy Spot to our friends and family!

So I had to go at midnight to get the puppy. I also looked at the puppy's flight and noticed that it was in his crate from 5PM-12AM. That broke my heart. name: Maureen E.
subject: We love our puppy
message: Overall, we're happy with Puppy Spot. The positives are we love our little Olive (mini-golden doodle). She is bundle of licking, jumping joy. She's a great addition to our family. The website worked very well in helping to identify the puppy we wanted. Now the negatives. She arrived little sick with a parasite - giardia. She barely ate the first day. I think the customer service could improve after the purchase. Puppy Spot sends a computer link that is supposed to allow the buyer to get information on their dog and the status of the transaction, delivery, etc. The representative I spoke with said the link probably wouldn't work and it didn't. This tells me the company may not care about getting it fixed. Maybe it's a cost issue. Also, I believe the sales rep told me the dog would arrive with a personal item like a blanket or toy to help with the trauma of separation and travel by van. Nothing came with Olive. Overall, very happy with our new puppy.

subject: Puppy Spot has been great

message: I found the most perfect little puppy and from my initial contact with Puppyspot, I received amazing service and could not be happier. Communication was top notch, someone was available for any question at any time. My little guy arrived healthy and happy with proper documentation. It was a difficult decision to have such a small pup travel so far, but with the puppy chaperone service, I was kept up to date with pics videos and texts during his journey. I could tell that his chaperone genuinely cared about my puppies welfare and went out of her way to keep me and him both comfortable during the trip. couldn't ask for a better experience!

name: Annise M.
subject: Best Experience ever!
message: This is was by far the best and easiest experience ever! The website was easy to navigate and I was able to find the perfect puppy within just a few days of searching. I loved that the details provided about the puppy was exactly the information that I was looking for (i.e. size of mom and dad, breeder history with PuppySpot, videos of the puppy). Brenda helped us find the right puppy and was great to work with! After purchasing our puppy, we were told that we would get the puppy within 2-3 weeks and they were right! We actually were able to get him a little earlier on the actual pickup date. We are so happy that we found PuppySpot and highly recommend that if you are searching for your forever friend, you will be happy with PuppySpot! We absolutely love our puppy! Our puppy looks exactly like the photos, but is even more beautiful in person!

name: Judy L.
subject: Puppy Review.
message: An amazing experience from start to finish. So please with ZION (now Gizmo). Such a loving lap puppy. Has taken to his familiar surroundings very well. Now so fond of his first VET visit, mostly humiliating for him. Mommy's sorry it happened. Will definitely recommend PUPPYSPOT to any one looking to receive a best friend.

name: Leanne G.
subject: Healthy happy puppy
message: A friend of mine referred me to puppy spot after finding her puppy and having a great experience. Finding and adopting our perfect puppy was easy on the website. The video of the chosen puppy sealed the deal. Puppy spot was always available to answer questions and very helpful. As promised we received our puppy within 14 days. The transportation process was seamless and delivered her via premier transport company on time. The transporters were friendly and as soon as we met our puppy we all cried in happiness. Lots of licks by our happy healthy puppy immediately. We are overjoyed with our new baby. We love our Corgi! Thank you puppy spot!

name: Barbara K.
subject: Billy
message: Billy is home and we love him. His a delightful, healthy little boy and we are delighted with him and the service provided by PuppySpot.

name: Nelida M.
subject: Peluche's adventure
message: The overall experience was good. The dog is very healthy. Looking forward to very visit to confirm. The wait, travel and secrecy was confusing. But over all we are very pleased.

name: Michael D.
subject: Great way to find your new best friend!
message: They were exceptional and made the process very clear and easy along the way.

name: Laura A.
subject: New puppy
message: Had another wonderful experience with PuppySpot. The woman I worked with on the phone took her time, was very friendly and engaging, and clearly really wanted to help me find the exact right puppy for our family. She had no problem when I wanted to take some time to think about it, and made sure I knew how to quickly reach her when I called back. She was knowledgeable about the different breeders and sent photos of the parents of multiple puppies, to help me visualize what the puppies might look like as adults. Needless to say, she helped us find the perfect puppy! And the drivers dropped him off less than 2 weeks later (the drivers were super nice and cleaned him up so that he was cute as a button). We love our new puppy! He is sweet, loveable, quiet, and already was sleeping through the nice in his crate on arrival. And our original PuppySpot puppy loves him to death.

subject: The puppy I got from
message:
The puppy I got from you is wonderful! She has a great temperament. She plays by herself, if we aren't available to play with her all the time. She also doesn't bark excessively.
My only complaint is with the shipper. The crate was supposed to come with the puppy. I had to ask him for it, and he wanted to charge me $100! When I told him that I had specifically asked Liz about the crate, and was informed that I would receive the crate, then he gave it to me! He also had money on the clipboard for me to sign, reminding me to tip him. After paying $799 for delivery, I didn't think he needed a tip.

She was such a little doll. Looks exactly like her pictures. She seemed to be partially potty trained and crate trained which is wonderful. She accepted us immediately and we are having so much fun. Thank you Puppy Spot for choosing top notch breeders.

subject: Wonderful experience very easy and lots of communication
message:
Purchasing Rocky from Puppy Spot was super easy. The customer delivered representative was very nice and explained energy very throughly. They even gave me some extra info on the Rocky's patents and sent me some extra pictures
 After the purchase they stayed in contact regularly. They sent us basically a puppy starter kit with harness, toys, leash, etc. They made transportation arrangements for us and then all was left was the wait. Which was only a couple weeks which was good it gave us time to puppy proof our home and purchase other items he needed for the day of pick up
The transporters contacted us about throughout the transport and have us updates. They actually arrived early for pick up so we were able to get him a little earlier from the pick up spot. The location is a public area and they do multiple drops at the same location so it's a general location that's equally close for all parties involved. We had a great experience and our puppy is happy and healthy. Thank you Puppy Spot for helping us bring home our newest family member Rocky ❤️. We picked him up on Wednesday 1/3/24. So he's only been home a couple of days and we have all fallen in love with him

name: Michelle S.
subject: Love our puppy!
message: I decided to get my husband a cocker spaniel puppy for Christmas. He'd been wanting a dog for so long. We are in our mid 60's and I knew I wanted a cocker spaniel again. We've had 4 cockers previously during our marriage so we had certain expectations of the breed. We couldn't be happier. Our puppy is 5 1/2 months old, i purposely looked for a slightly older puppy, and he is acclimating well to his new home. He is basically house broken already, he gets along with my sons temperamental cat and is great with our 2 year old grandson, who wasn't really used to dogs. Even though he was vet certified before he was shipped, I took him to my own trusted vet who also gave him a clean bill of health and thought he had a wonderful temperament. It took 2 1/2 weeks til we received our puppy, which felt like forever, but the PuppySpot team kept us informed and responded to our texts and questions.

name: Sarena R.
subject: All the stars aligned
message:
I lost my 17 year old Yorkie Rio at the end of September. Needless to say, I was heartbroken but very soon I realized there would be another dog in my future. I had done some research and decided that I wanted a hybrid or what is now known as a designer dog. The next thing I know, I found puppy spot and the most perfect Yorkiepoo named Mazie. Not familiar with adopting a dog online, I asked my dad for help. After using his engineering skills, my dad stumbled across the same site and the same puppy. 

Puppy spot knew I was cruising their site and before you know it, I got a text message from Lauren. That text message turned into a very long informative conversation where Lauren and I also bonded over our fur babies. Of course she also answered any and all of my questions, and made it all very clear and easy. Within 24 hours I had adopted her and the nervous excitement began. After all it had been almost 18 years since I had a puppy.

About a week later, I drove 8 1/2 hours north to pick up this little girl in 20° weather. There are no words. We took our time coming home but within the first 48 hours she had already stayed in a hotel, driven through three states, met all her checkmarks, been to a pet store, met her cat brother and sister, and even got a haircut. 

Since her adoption, Mazie has become Cali Marie and made herself a right at home. She cleared her first vet visit with flying colors and weighed in at a whole 5 pounds. 

Puppy spot made everything easy, but in an understandable manner. They also understood that adopting a new puppy was an experience. I was reminded of that experience when I got a care package delivered in the mail from puppy spot. I’m very thankful for their support and everything they did to go above and beyond and make this the best experience. Thank you!

Again a testament to the breeder and the transporter. Puppy Spot did a great job vetting the breeder. This is my first experience with Puppy Spot. I highly recommend them to anyone who wants a first class puppy concierge.

message:

There she was on my screen and seemed to be looking at me with those eyes and sweet face. My husband was called to see and both agree she is our baby we need and want.

Called and talked with Lisa at Puppy Spot. How professional and helpful with my questions and concerns. Next couple days
I had more questions and concerns and was always assisted in a polite and helpful way.
NEVER treated in a negative way. I was being put to ease “These people are the real thing, 
And can be trusted.
We received several emails up to and including news our new love Shihtzu was on the way home.

Our transporters names were shared with dates and estimated times of arrival. We was notified that time was better than estimated .
We were so excited! Our transporters were friendly ,dependable, and more than willing to answer questions. I was thrilled and excited.

My whole experience from beginning to end with “Puppy Spot” went perfect for us . From an experience that could go so wrong - all went Sssooo right. We are grateful. We are thankful. You all are trustworthy and very dependable.

You are all that you say you are and keep on keeping on. .!!! I recommend you HIghly to all.

I wanted to take this time and share . I would have been wrong if I did not, You all-including our Shihtzu breeder affiliated with .”Puppy Spot” is now being sung praises from me.
Thanks and appreciation 
Patricia

name: Robert F.
subject: Happy Customer
message:
The website is not set up to where you can purchase more than one dog at once. I was getting to puppies and I had to submit multiple orders for two dogs which was an annoyance. Candace from PuppySpot took the initiative and was very helpful in working me through it.

Other than the above, I enjoyed using the site while working through choosing a new pet. The website was well laid out, and easy to search, sort, and favorite different puppies. The additional details, such as pictures, parents, etc, were a nice touch. It made me confident in the puppies I wanted to bring home. 

After the purchase, the details of what to expect and what would happen were explained to me. The coordination with transport was easy enough, and the amount of documentation and the thoroughness of their vet records even impressed my personal veterinarian. 

Overall, I'm very happy. I have two happy, healthy, puppies and my family has been thrilled with them.

Oh my goodness! What an experience! Honestly, we constantly talked about taking a chance with PuppySpot. So much on the internet, you just can't trust but the results are 100% satisfaction, with everything.
Lucy was found on the internet and the pictures said it all. Why she wasn't snapped up right away, I have no clue. four days with the two of us and she has provided so much joy, love, and laughter.
The process was easy. From what we read, we knew Lucy was for us! Without having to think about it, Lucy became a part of our family.
All communications with PuppySpot were wonderful and prepared us for this new experience. I was thrilled with all of the expectations placed on us to sort of qualify us. Thank you for doing that. If anything, we were over-prepared. We opted to drive the 15 hours one way to meet Lucy. The breeder met us on time at the pre-determined location.
The drive home took much longer than anticipated, but for the entire 20-hour drive home Lucy spent in our arms.
Thank you. This was a wonderful experience. She is experieince so many wonderful new things including two swims in the lake.

name: Steve S.
subject: Lil Dodi
message: From the time I inquired about their services to the delivery and even after delivery, they were very professional and did everything they said they would. The puppy is happy, healthy and surprisingly well trained.

name: Christine E.
subject: Hand off
message: Our white GSD is a cutie. I would say I was disappointed with the details on the travel hand off. While making the decision to do ground transport or pick up, I was told he was 400mi away, when he was almost 500 miles away. And I was supposed to hear from the breeder the day before. I didn’t her from her until 40 minutes before meeting. This was anxiety provoking since I had just travel 8 hours to get there.

name: Melanie C.
subject: I appreciate the incredible professionalism
message: I appreciate the incredible professionalism and care they took with this process! Thank you! We love Blaze so much and are so glad he is a part of our family!

name: Loretta H.
subject: Charlie is home!
message: PuppySpot helped us to find the perfect puppy for our family.I saw Charlie's photo and knew he was the one for us. Communication with PuppySpot, purchase, arrangements for travel, pet insurance, AKC registration were easy. Upon arrival, the exchange was smooth. The driver was in contact during traffic delays so we knew what to expect. Arrival...our little guy is just what we expected in every way. A perfect breeding line with great genetics. We are so happy we found PuppySpot!

name: Michelle H.
subject: So glad we got her.
message: We picked up Tilly on Thursday and she has been a complete joy. We are so glad we decided to adopt her. Besides being beautiful she also has quite a sense of humor and is getting along with the other dogs very very well. We look forward to enjoying many years of love and laughter with Tilly.

name: Kimberly H.
subject: I was very nervous picking
message: I was very nervous picking a puppy without seeing it first but the staff made me feel so comfortable and spent so much time answering all my questions. message: Second time I have used Puppy Pro for my Yorkies and both times they were fantastic to deal with. Highly recommend them to anyone who may inquire.

This is my first cocker spaniel ever, so it is a fun new experience. He's just the right size for most people to feel comfortable around, too, dog lover or not, so he's been popular with children and visitors.

subject: Excellent service.

He already knows sit, come here, and down. Still working on house training but it’s a slow process. I couldn’t be happier with our relationship and bonding. He’s the best!

message: The purchase process was very smooth. They check the health of the dog so you don't have to worry. The transportation worked very well. I was nervous not having bought from out of state before, but Puppy Spot had it handled. I recommend them to purchase a puppy.'They open up the country for finding your perfect dog. I love my new puppy! She is a darling!

name: Brooke W.
subject: Healthy adorable puppy. The whole
message: Healthy adorable puppy. The whole process was super easy.

name: Joananne J.
subject: Love my NEW Molly Golden
message:
Love my NEW Molly Golden Retriever puppy. While a bit hesitant ordering a dog online, all went smoothly and as advertised. Her first health visit with my veterinarian showed no signs of any health problems. 

Having to go through puppy life after so many, many years is fun and also challenging but she is smart and eager to please. She is sleeping under my chair as I write this review. She is sleeping peacefully and comfortable in her new home.

So glad I bought her just two weeks after I had to put my two-year-old down due to health issues. She has eased my grief tremendously and I now focus on her and our new long life together.

Animals can heal our hearts in many ways.

name: Jerry S.
subject: Very helpful. Made picking up
message: Very helpful. Made picking up Benjamin so easy. Will definitely recommend.

message: AMAZING EXPERIENCE! We are so thrilled about how everything went from the moment we decided to welcome our beautiful boy home! Thank you to all of the wonderful people who cared for him and got him to us. He's perfect! We are so in love! Kim Kennedy & Family

My husband suffered a stroke recently and there are truly no words to express his joy when I bring Bear to him. Thank you for this gentle, affectionate, funny little guy.

subject: Absolutely awesome place
message: This place is great when looking for you forever fur baby. They are always ready to answer all your questions. If the aren’t able to answer your calls they call you right back. They keep you in the loop step by step of your baby growth, health, and the way your fur baby will get to you. The reps are great very compassionate and knowledgeable and has all the answers to your questions and if by chance they don’t they find out. Very happy with everything puppy spot has done and getting my new fur baby to me. Will recommend Puppy Spot to my friends and family. The only thing that I can suggest is it would help if they would put the puppy’s state of location on the information page when customers are looking for their new puppy.

message: I’m totally in love with my Whoodle! he is an infant he has gained 2 pounds. an absolutely stunning little boy .

name: Natalie T.
subject: We absolutely LOVE our healthy,
message: We absolutely LOVE our healthy, happy, pup! Puppy Spot did a fabulous job working with us on the adoption and coordinating his safe and sound arrival! Only thing I wish is that they could also connect us directly to the breeder so we could ask specific questions, like routine and temperament questions, or ask for more pictures besides the ones provided. That's my only suggestion for improvement, though. They were truly thoughtful, caring, and easy to work with and our puppy is perfect in every way! Surprisingly well-trained for a little guy, too, so breeder did an A+ job!

subject: Puppy spot is fantastic way
message: Puppy spot is fantastic way to find the puppy you want and that has a thorough service of health checks and travel coordination plans. name: Elizabeth C.
subject: It was a perfect fit for us and our new family member
message: We had a fantastic experience from beginning to end, with choosing our puppy, communicating with PuppySpot about travel arrangements and receiving our new family member. I’ve had a previous horrible experience and I can tell you the breeder matters a lot.

subject: Fantastic!

Puppy Spot did an excellent job of always answering my questions and helping me to understand the process. Thank you for all the videos, links, and articles you included as they helped refresh my puppy mom memory after nearly sixteen years with my first maltipoo. Great experience with Puppy Spot!

Thank you so much PuppySpot for my lovely new buddy, I’m in love.

message: The whole process was smooth and seamless, customer service was great, and I love my little Yorkie so much! I recommend Puppyspot to anyone who is looking to purchase a puppy.

subject: Getting my puppy
message:
I love my puppy. She is good tempered and knows her name already. She is playful and loving.
The man who met us with Tutu was friendly and helpful about finding the meeting spot.
The staff was helpful about making all the arrangements.
The puppy pack is very useful and good quality.

name: Paula S.
subject: Happy with our new pup!
message:
Puppy Spot was great. The people were very friendly, the follow through and the services provided were all excellent. 
I only had 2 major concerns:
 1. We were told our pup came with a guarantee of health. Once we got our pup it turns out in order to receive this guarantee we had to apply for pet insurance through a provider associated with Puppy Spot at $70 a month. Not cool!
 2. We were never asked anything about our home situation. No one asked if our home was adequate for a new puppy, what other animals we might have, will our pup get the attention and care he needs. I would expect more from a professional breeder/provider to make sure their pups go to good homes.

name: Dianne M.
subject: So very happy with the
message: So very happy with the whole process in obtaining our sweet little puppy. Wonderful communication prior to pickup and for many weeks after with numerous educational and supportive emails. It's obvious they want to make our experience fabulously positive and I would freely recommend them in obtaining a puppy.

subject: Absolutely love this fury bundle
message: Absolutely love this fury bundle of joy! Thank you puppy spot!

name: Dani V.
subject: Bringing our new friend home
message:
we used puppy spot to bring home our newest puppy. After encountering. and weeding through a number of other scams online I found puppy spot. It was so easy to sort by breed and look through all the dogs and once I found our little guy it was as simple of clicking the "bring me home" button. 

 I was able to speak to a real person on the phone with any questions. She had my order pulled up immediately, told me where my puppy was located and how long they had worked with the breeder. (locations etc are not on site for safety) then get a puppy specific code for the app (only once purchase. was complete) to track and communicate the entire process. There was plenty of communication so I never worried about what step or timing we were on. 
We had our little guy transported by van to our state. I was given a cell number and got texts during the transport to reassure and update timing. Upon arrival we met at our local airport cell lot. There were multiple other people picking up their dogs. Providing an ID I was handed this fluffy little guy along with his paperwork and food. We are thrilled to have him in his forever home. I would absolutely work with puppy spot again if we were to get. another puppy in the future.

name: Daina P.
subject: Lady (formerly known as Vera)
message: So the process to start was super easy Linda F was helping us and she was so very kind and informative. Once we proceeded forward we were updated via the PuppySpot app with our pup’s specific ID from new pictures to health/travel info. What I didn’t like is how she was transported, in an RV. I’m saying that because the email stated they stop for puppy breaks being it’s a 13 hour plus drive along with other pups. I will say the drivers were great with letting us know they were behind due to traffic, etc. when they took her out you saw all the crates of puppies stacked so right away i thought no way were there stops. Other than the transportation we waited about a week in between to get her and she’s absolutely beautiful. I HIGHLY suggest you get your puppy checked out within 7 days. Our lady girl had tapeworm, roundworm and giardia and that was found 4 days after we received her. PuppySpot does live up to their health commitment and covered the costs for treatment (medication, specific GI food and fecal sample). She is doing well and much better. I would recommend PuppySpot if you’re looking for a specific purebred companion anywhere else I looked they were mixed but was told purebred. And of course they the heath commitment is a major plus.

subject: American Airlines Customer Service
message: You guys were great. But American Airlines sucked, they were worst than terrible. 1) My Beagle was bumped from one flight to another because of weather and when I inquired what flight and time she would be on they told me "You'll get her, when you get her". Then they hung-up on me. 2) Once my Beagle got to the Grand Rapids Airport, an Airline Employee carried her to the office to and placed the carrier inside the door so I could my paperwork. Then this "Karen" lost it stating the dog does not belong in the "open air" office, she hates dogs, etc. The Airline Employee who carried her picked up the crate and moved it outside of the office. This guy was great understanding and great employee. Well back to "Karen", she's still screaming and carrying on like an fool. I asked her for my paperwork, she threw the paperwork at me, I picked it up, got my dog and went home.

I never even learned her parents' names or their health history. I had to drive an hour to pick her up... although the delivery service drivers were lovely. Again, I love our dog, but missed learning about her the way I did when I spoke with the breeders directly for our other dog (a lab - 8 years old).

message: I have to admit I was apprehensive about getting a puppy from an online dealer, but PuppySpot has been nothing but great to deal with. Their customer service was extremely friendly and helpful and answered all my questions. The shipment of our puppy was easy and the communication between me and PuppySpot was great. Make sure to download the App, it’s very helpful. The crate they shipped our puppy in was packed with a lot of newspaper shredding so that he was comfortable. They also had a water and food dish attached to the front on the crate for him to eat from if he was hungry/thirsty. The care package they send you for your puppy is full of high quality items and I was happily surprised with the amount of toys they sent. I will definitely use PuppySpot again in the future. 5 Stars!

message: Just like my first amazing Puppy Spot experience, almost 4 years ago when I received my first cockapoo puppy, Zoomer, we instantly fell in love with Sailor, our new Puppy Spot pup. The customer service with Leira was awesome, she sent us photos of Sailor's parents that we requested and answered every question and concern immediately. When we asked to change the date to pick up Sailor in Indiana sooner, communication was a bit slow with that team, however, I called the Management number, and spoke with KC who was a delight and who was able to get all the details ironed out for us right away. Leira and KC made our experience extremely easy and worry free.The day we drove to Shipshawana, Indiana to meet the breeder, I asked him if he would be so kind as to send us a photo of Sailor (who was originally named Henderson) and his litter mates, he sent us not one, but four of the most adorable photos with his three brothers. It touched our hearts beyond words, and we will forever treasure these photos! Thank you Puppy Spot for arranging for us to add our sweet little Sailor to our family. He has been a complete joy so far, and will be even more joyful once he is finsihed teething! We couldn't love our two Puppy Spot Boys more!!!!

name: Laura B.
subject: Puppy buying experience
message: This was an unusual way to find a puppy. The experience had us second guessing ourselves throughout the process. The staff at puppy spot did explain the process perfectly, but we were still uncomfortable. When contacting puppy spot, I would be on hold for a very long time! We were not given an exact date for arrival, so we decided to pick up the puppy ourselves. We did not have any pics of the puppy with the litter mates or the mother. We could not contact the breeder or have any information about them until we picked our puppy up. We are very happy with our puppy but wish the experience would have been more personal.

Having that personal contact with the breeder was a huge help. The breeder would send me recent and updated photos and videos of my puppy. Puppy was/is in great health and arrived without any issues as well as a welcome package from the breeder. I am surely recommending this service to anyone and everyone!

subject: Highly recommend!
message: Puppyspot was wonderful to work with for the most part. When trying to narrow down which puppy to get, Lisa was so patient and informative and really helped me feel confident in my decision. We are overjoyed with our boy, Jax. The only difficult part was in trying to communicate with anyone during the travel planning phase. The travel planners are not very responsive or helpful. We ended up having to drive quite a distance to an airport which was not the closest airport making for an extra long day for a puppy that had traveled for many hours and a dangerous winter drive for us. However, the travel arrangements, while not ideal, did go off flawlessly and at the end of the day we have a beautiful, healthy puppy.

name: Steve K.

Once we purchased our boy, everything was communicated, I had several calls with puppy managers and the app explained everything. We got our pick up location, they were on time and the puppy transfer was smooth.

We love our new boy so much, he is the perfect addition to our family. I have also made use of the free vetster appointments and some of the discount codes. 

Would definitely recommend!

message: We are so blessed to have our new puppy in our life. We’re thankful to Puppyspot for that, and always will be. I did knock off 2 stars because I felt that after I purchased my new fur baby communication went out the window from puppy spot. I had to call them to confirm my puppies arrival and I waited on hold for 45 minutes to talk to a “puppy manager” for less than 3 minutes. Our puppy traveled by plane and arrived healthy, happy and is settling in perfectly! We love him so much!!!!

name: Andrea B.

name: Tina L.
subject: Our puppy is a very

name: Domonique W.
subject: Thank you PuppySpot!
message: PuppySpot made this process so incredibly easy! As a first time dog owner, I knew absolutely nothing about how to find a dog, let alone the very specific breed I wanted. PuppySpot did everything, from vet to getting her home. I’ve recommended the app to three people looking for puppies already. What a big dose of happy Brandy has brought into our home! We’re forever thankful for PuppySpot.

name: Ekoko L.
subject: Goldendoodle Rocks - Get One Now
message: I'm so thankful for the process and the help I got from Puppyspot team until my golden doodle arrived. I got my puppy wen he was only 4/mo., and was shipped when he was 5/mo and gotten the okay from the vet to be flew. Because this was my first time with dog it took about a month or so for both of us to be fully adjusted toward one another. Slowly my not so puppy anymore is more open and obedient. I trained him by looking on different videos on YouTube and I'm so amazed on how great I did. I'm wicked proud of myself and my golden doodle for been patient with me when I didn't understand his signs when he needed to go, or when he wanted to play and I took it as he was misbehaving. Overall, we are well, and thank you Puppyspot for everything!

name: Sarah A.
subject: The Adventures of PuppySpot and Pickles
message: The PuppySpot process was wonderful from start to finish! Our Puppy Manager, David, was so kind and walked us through every single step of the process. He was even available by text anytime if we had questions or needed an update. Our Shihpoo, Pickles, arrived with a Puppy Chaperone and I instantly realized that it was worth every penny to have her accompanied. She was clean, happy and was in the arms of a human being cuddled & loved instead of in a crate all alone and terrified. She is in amazing health (per our Veterinarian) and she even knew to use to potty pad on the first day home. She is even softer and cuter than the photos showed! We couldn't be more thrilled to have our family complete and we recommend PuppySpot to everyone now. With he first vet visit free & a few free telehealth visits, along with detailed records & microchip, the money spent starts to make sense very quickly! 10/10 recommend.

name: Jenny Y.
subject: Wonderful and stress free experience.
message: Wonderful and stress free experience. We love our new girl and she was already well trained when we got her! Thank you for helping our pup find her forever family!

name: Nicole N.
subject: Wonderful experience and puppy
message: We had an excellent experience with Puppy Spot. The customer service was very helpful and went out of their way to make this a positive experience. I was a little nervous about the travel since our puppy came from far away but the communication was great and she arrived as scheduled. Our puppy, Mia is wonderful and everything we had hoped for in a dog. She came crate trained and mostly potty trained. She is cuddly, smart, and funny! She is the perfect addition to our family and we couldn’t be happier.

name: Stephanie C.
subject: Amazing experience
message: We are soooo in love with our puppy and super impressed with the whole experience. They even sent us update videos along the way. Kassie is the perfect addition to our family. 100% recommend!

subject: A Great Experience!!!
message:

Sincerely,
Anthony and Kimberly C.

name: Betsy S.
subject: Love our dog but communication lacking
message: Once you pay for your dog - you'll get radio silence. As it was our first time, we expected that we would have more information after a large investment. We were also told we would hear from the Breader of our dog - which we never did - even though I asked multiple times. From the day of payment to delivery it was 2.5 weeks.

name: Craig H.
subject: Very easy process. The communication
message: Very easy process. The communication was outstanding, and our Lulu was delivered efficiently, healthy and safe. We have now added 2 Basset Hounds to our family from Puppy Spot over the past few years and have had a great experience both times.

name: Steve C.
subject: We could not be any
message:
We could not be any happier with the process we went through with Puppy Spot. 

Everything went fantastic and we received our wonderful Goldendoodle 3 weeks ago and he was clean and fed during transport by the Pet Transport company. The workers that were responsible for transporting the dogs were phenomenal and you could really see how much they cared when giving the new owners their dogs. Lol, dogs were transported in a Mercedes Sprinter

Very obvious the the breeder really took great care of our puppy during the 8+ weeks they had him. He is so loving to everyone. Can see why Puppy Spot is very picky with who they deal with for breeders. I recommend Puppy Spot at the highest level if you are looking for a dog.

You get what you pay for and in the dog breeding business it gave us tremendous peace of mind that we were getting a quality puppy from a quality breeder.

We brought him to our vet the day after we picked him up and was pleased that he was in excellent condition and was up to date with most of his shots.

subject: Everything went flawlessly. Picked up
message:
Everything went flawlessly. Picked up our beautiful girl at Palm Springs airport. Her chaperone, Queen was wonderful. You could tell my puppy was treated very well; after being in the air many hours with a stop over, she came to us happy and content. 
We have had her about 2 weeks; besides all the usual puppy behaviors, she is a beautiful, perfect toy poodle. Kudos to the breeder. Thank you for bringing us such joy and happiness.

name: Pamela P.
subject: Our beautiful babies!
message: My two puppies arrived in NV in perfect condition. We adore both of them. The breeder for one of the puppies even called to check on our baby. Puppy Spot, although expensive was worth every cent. Their service was outstanding in every respect. I highly recommend this company

name: Jan M.
subject: We love our new doodle
message: We love our new doodle Sunny, the information we received about her, her arrival etc was not always consistent, but finally got her and couldn't be more pleased!!

I have so much joy, and I am at rest knowing that my puppy is here safe and sound. I wouldn’t recommend any other way of adopting a puppy!

name: Tong B.
subject: The experience was good. I
message: The experience was good. I was informed of the process the entire time and when I called to talk to someone he always answered all my questions. Our French bulldog Gemini was exactly how he was pictured. He is loving, friendly, and full of energy! He’s a great fit for our family!

name: David C.
subject: PuppySpot Rocks!
message:
I will admit some apprehension when first engaging PuppySpot. We had never dealt with a pet broker before.

However, after speaking with our representative and getting details about our chosen puppy, our confidence began to grow. We did finalize the transaction and made arrangements for pick up.

The coordination between the breeder and broker were spot on. Our newest family member was everything we'd heard and the delivery was quite smooth.

We would not hesitate to recommend PuppySpot to anyone looking for a forever friend but uncertain of pursuing this avenue. It was a terrific experience.

name: Frank B.
subject: Outstanding Support
message: Purchasing a puppy can be a difficult decision. I appreciate the patience Puppy Spot staff demonstrated over the 5 or so phone calls we had to arrive at the final decision. The puppy has been with us for about a month and we are much richer for having him in our lives. Thanks again!

message: We are so enjoying both of our yorkies thank you guys so much!!!!!

name: Rhonda R.
subject: Everything was great except the
message: Everything was great except the transportation. I was expecting to drive a half hour to the Harrisburg International Airport. Instead I ended up driving three hours in heavy traffic to new jersey. I was very disappointed to learn of this change. On the up side, our little faith is an incredible puppy. She doesn't bark unless she wants to alert us to someone at the door. Loves everyone, even the cat - they both sleep with me. We go for long walks, she loves toys, goes into her crate willingly, even when she doesn't have to. All in all, a wonderful dog. I couldn't be happier. Thank you so much!

name: Douglas C.
subject: "BAILEY" Love of our lives...
message: Linda from Puppy Spot was fantastic. My wife and i are recent transplants to northern Nevada. Our adult children decided to stay in California. My wife was having separation anxiety and i knew i had to get her a new baby to care for and keep her company. We had always talked about getting a French bulldog. Puppy Spot came highly recommended by some of our new friends here. The website was so easy to navigate and the photos and puppy descriptions where great. I went on the site and found "Darla Sue", who my wife renamed "Bailey". Linda, the Puppy Spot representative was great. She helped me with the whole process. I surprised my wjfe and when she saw the photos she was so happy. When Bailey arrived by plane with a Puppy Spot chaperone my wife was so excited. Bailey is a beautiful, happy, and healthy little lady. She truly turned our beautiful new house into a beautiful new home. We are so thankful to Linda and Puppy Spot for bringing Bailey into our lives. I have recommended your site to many people looking for a wonderful addition to their family.

name: Tiffany D.
subject: Ashley from puppy spot was
message: Ashley from puppy spot was extremely helpful & nice to work with. She helped me with any issue . Thank you!

name: Doreen F.
subject: Wonderful experience from first call to delivery!
message: Love our Goldendoodle named Sybil we call her Sybi. Without PuppySpot we never would have known she existed. Thank you beyond measure.

name: Shawn S.
subject: Great at contacting you as
message: Great at contacting you as soon as you find a dog that you are interested in. After you start paying for the dog the communication kinda starts lacking. Kinda started to feel like a scam but it did turn out very good and got the dog without issues.

name: Matthew D.
subject: Success
message: While the road with PuppySpot was far from a well informed journey the end result for me has been everything and more than I could have expected. Dog was the dog I picked. Met on the day we were supposed to. All things considered the way they operate is safest for a business to continue to be successful. It’s not what you know it’s who you know and they have at least one incredible breeder that I adopted from. I will be using them again and would recommend them for patient clients.

name: Deborah B.
subject: the people i dealt with
message:
the people i dealt with were all delightful and helped me with my anxiety and fears as I went through the process of waiting for my puppy to arrive. I always felt their concern for the puppies was real.
We are all happy campers now- thank you so much!

Our little pup arrived healthy and very happy to see us. After delivery could use some fine tuning.

name: Terry R.
subject: Perfect Bernedoodle for my wife.
message: Our Bernedoodle puppy arrived when we were told to he would be here. Only issue was a little bit of a delay in getting information. Pup was to arrive 9/8/22 nothing was ever mentioned about being late, then the evening of 9/7/22 I checked our app and the date was changed to a week out.....well damn I took the day off work to join my wife to pick up the puppy. On 9/10/22 I was notified he wouldn't arrive until 9/15/22. Which he did....my wife fell in love instantly and she bonded with the little guy on the drive home. He has been the greatest companion for my wife on her walks. When he arrived he was just 12 wks. old and 10.5#. He is now 18 wks 27.5# and just the greatest dog I have ever known. Other than the one hiccup at the time of delivery our communication was straight forward and informative. We chose our puppy, got him reserved and completed the transaction quickly and easily, Linda F. Helped us go through it all and answered all of our questions. After that it was just the waiting and anticipation, preparing our home for him. "Tank" has stolen our hearts and he is totally devoted to us. Our vet had never seen a Bernedoodle so he is always the center of attention. We can't Thank Puppy Spot enough for providing the chance for us to choose our perfect puppy."Tank" is a standard Sable colored male Bernedoodle....we are expecting him to be close to 100# when full grown. 1st picture 2nd day home Mary Ann & Tank - 12 wks old. 2nd picture Terry & Tank - 18 wks. Just our little Fluff monster.

Fortunately, I had a good idea of what to expect, but there were several glitches with the tech app, and my questions were bounced around, giving the impression that my puppy’s safety and transport were not a priority. 
It also is probably not a good practice-or advertising- to tell expected buyers after you have their money that they should limit contact.

message: We don't have any photos or videos. I don't know how to put that on the comp. But Macho is quite a puppy. He has a bad problem biting. He bit me bad on my left bottom of my hand. Drew blood. I'm a dog cop since the 70s, I Don't hit any animals no matter what kind of an animal. I told him he was a bad boy. He licked my hand. I was amazed he actually did that. I could tell he was sorry. He snuggled up to me for a few hours. I'm wheelchair redden at the moment. I will walk in the near future. Macho has basically almost stopped. We have a Shiba Inu also. She will be 7 on December 12th. She loves him. The two of them play all day long. They sleep 3 to 4 times a day. We love them both. He has no separation anxiety because of Sheba. The 26th of this month he'll be 4 months older. He knows some knowledge of obedience. Someone must have taught him. Part of my training is done. Thank You. Have a great day. Vesta Mark Sheba and Macho.

She is the sixth dog I’ve owned and clearly the best. She’s joyful very playful,loves people, is very smart and trainable . Best of all she has a sweet gentle nature. She was clearly well treated before she got to me ! I couldn’t be happier. She was completely checked out by my Vet here who was pleased with her health and condition. message: I wound up with a great dog, but I found the app difficult to work with, some information diffcult to obtain, and some customer service reps much better and more responsive than others, i.e., some were a little curt and unrepsosnive, some were fabulous. name: Meagan R.
subject: I love my puppy!
message: My experience with PuppySpot was amazing. From purchasing my puppy to getting her home. Finding a well bred silver Lab puppy has been very difficult until now. No wait lists, lots of choices and you get to pick the puppy you want. They do take a while to get back to you when you contact them for questions but that’s only because they’re busy assisting so many people with getting their fur babies home safe and sound. They always responded to my many, many questions and everyone I spoke to was kind and accommodating. You can tell they really care about what they are doing. My puppy came via ground and was delivered to me by Rusty. He let me know if there were any updates on the time and picking Haven (now named Amren) up was seamless. The breeder did a fantastic job with her. I only wish she had provided me with her contact info so I can thank her properly! My puppy is gorgeous, healthy, full of love and has SO much energy! If you were like me and think that PuppySpot sounds too good to be true, trust in the process and take the leap! Thank you so much to the wonderful team at PuppySpot for helping me find my new best friend! My heart is so full, I could not be happier!

She listened to me and discussed how the process works, and even reserved “Brenda” who is now Daisy! It was a great experience and I would definitely recommend and use puppy-spot again! Thank you for causing me to smile again!!

subject: Great service reps & travel arrangements
message:
We now have 2 puppies from puppy spot, different breeders and almost a year apart. The first customer service rep went above and beyond. The second was a little more delayed with responses but still helpful and informative. I would highly recommend using puppy spot in the future to anyone looking for a pet. First dog was driven and dropped off at our door, the second flew into the local airport. Both experiences were smooth and the dogs were very content. We (and our daughter) love them both. Tails and Whiskey.

We also purchased the puppy kit with toys, bowls, bed, etc for both dogs. Even a year apart we received the EXACT SAME items. Whiskey was very happy to have a new Pig/Cow toy because that was his favorite, and Tails also for some reason is more into that one. So congrats to whomever created that specific toy, it's a hit with these two daschunds.

name: Nick C.
subject: Awesome service
message: Excellent service, very happy with how things went. Would recommend to anyone looking to purchase a puppy.

name: Jay B.
subject: Everything was absolutely great. I
message: Everything was absolutely great. I know how great a doxie I have as I have had purchased from breeders before. The process was easy and kept me up to speed until delivery. My furry friend is awesome. Thank you for making this a nice and easy process.

name: Lynn C.
subject: Great Concept - Falls Short with Communication
message:
We found the perfect puppy for us through PuppySpot. The business model is a fantastic concept. You can search through multiple breeds and quiz match to find a best fit breed for your lifestyle and home. You are not limited to puppies available near you. We are absolutely obsessed with our puppy!
Our only complaint has been our inability to communicate with PuppySpot when needed. Their response time via chat or live call is unacceptable and not customer respectful. If you can be patient with that process, you’ll be fine. That is definitely something that needs to improve if they are looking for repeat customers and word-of-mouth referrals.

name: Ninet J.
subject: Very professional and a joy
message: Very professional and a joy to speak to. The experience from start to finish was great. AA++

From the first call through delivery, I received nothing but good communication. Everything worked smoothly and I received my puppy earlier than expected. I would highly recommend PuppySpot. I adore the puppy I got. He is happy and healthy, and he fits right in with my family. Thank you!

message: Our puppy is amazing and perfect! My only complaint is that I was told there would be so much more communication and updates and I found it very very hard to get info from the breeder. Overall I’m thrilled with our puppy and using PuppySpot made finding him easy.

subject: Thank you PuppySpot and all
message:
Thank you PuppySpot and all the numerous courteous and informed Associates who made it possible for Benny, Alivia and Chloe to join my family. I initially selected the two females then three days later decided to keep all together and claimed the male. They arrived healthy, happy and have had no issues adjusting to their new environment. PuppySpot provided so much information and photos on their development over the three weeks before they were able to be released , on different Pet Insurances, and care to be given upon arrival as they were to be flown into Logan. Due to high temperatures they were instead transported by van and had individual attention the two days it took. They arrived healthy and happy with tails wagging furiously. No scams, no heavy sales techniques, just caring concern. I have since recommended PuppySpot to several people and I hope they will find the same caring and respect I found in this Agency.

name: Maria G.
subject: When our Chica met her Chico
message: Our family took a while to decide to get our first puppy. But after our daughter made her presentation to convince us and saved some money from her baking, we said yes during 4th of July weekend to get her future BFF! We found PuppySpot with great reviews, and instantly fell in love with a Cavapoo named Rayban posted on the site. We sent the request for information and within a couple of hours received a call from a Puppy Agent (Lisa Rasuly) to tell us more about Rayban. We decided that night to reserve and purchase Rayban. The process was fast and the PS app gave us updates we needed, even a new video from the breeder per our request. The travel date was set for July 21st (call and email from Emerson, the Puppy Manager), and even though that was just quick 3 weeks, it felt forever to get our very first fur baby! The day came with step by step updates from the American Airlines tracker. He came on time, waiting for us at the cargo area pickup. Rayban (now called Chico) is home! He has completed our family!

name: Nikki B.
subject: Newman the Beagle
message: The majority of the PuppySpot experience was wonderful and we absolutely love our new puppy. Our initial saleswoman (Linda) was awesome. She answered all of my questions, provided a ton of information, and was patient and fun to work with. I also communicated with her after the puppy’s arrival to thank her, and she went above and beyond to forward this note to the breeder, and I received a very kind response in return. The PuppySpot team that arranged the travel were excellent as well. They were very responsive in communicating instructions. I also can't say enough about the transport crew – they were exceptional! We had text updates along the way and it was obvious that all of the puppies were well cared for. The puppies arrived via ground transport as opposed to air travel. They were late because of traffic, but all I honestly cared about was that my puppy arrived safely, and he did. They kept in constant contact with a group of us to let us know how all of the puppies were doing as well as their anticipated ETA. There were just a couple of glitches that are preventing me from providing a 5-star review: The in-between phase after the initial sale was a little frustrating. There were automated responses and instructions were unclear. This got better later in the process when we were able to connect to an actual human. The other setback is that our puppy developed Giardia within a few days after arriving, which resolved with treatment. All in all, it was a fantastic experience and I would recommend them. Our new beagle puppy is amazing!

name: Michelle K.
subject: No one ever answer the
message: No one ever answer the chat. Everything else read great. Delivery was an hour late but to be expected with road construction and traffic.

subject: PuppySpot was responsive and upfront
message: PuppySpot was responsive and upfront about the timeframe it would take to get my puppy. The process was fairly painless although it would be nice to know if the puppy had any crate training or was house broken. We love our Chocolate Lab and her name is Jazzmin Lynn Robinson. Definitely a welcomed addition to our family.
