subject: Cavapoo
message: Our puppy is wonderful. He's playful and energetic. We immediately fell in love with him. Our sales representative was great, very helpful and polite. We did have a problem with the transportation of the puppy to Dallas. We were told that he would be flown on a plane and we would pick him up at Love Field. He was transported in a van that was loaded with dogs in small crates. His trip was around 16 hours in that crate. He was exhausted, hungry and thirsty. He was dirty and had been given a very poor trim. We do not believe that it is in the best interest of these dogs to be transported in this manner.

name: Susan K.
subject: My experience with Puppyspot was
message: My experience with Puppyspot was amazing. I had never owned a dog before and they made the process easy and answered all my questions both before and after Pepper joined our family! Thank you so much!

name: Marlene M.
subject: Very communicative and helpful. Our
message: Very communicative and helpful. Our little guys arrived just as planned via air travel. We’re so happy with our new family member. Would use PuppySpot again in the future!

name: Tonya C.
subject: Amazing experience!
message: The experience with PuppySpot was BEYOND our expectations. The team was incredibly helpful and kept us informed along the process. The app was a terrific resource, and we loved all the help aids provided to help us prepare to welcome our new puppy to our home. The companion that brought our Giggy to us was so loving and truly cared about her. Giggy is now well settled into our new home and family. We loved that the breeder called us after about a week just to check in on Giggy. End to end the entire experience was awesome and we’ve already recommended PuppySpot to several friends!

name: Kaya P.
subject: We found the process pretty
message: We found the process pretty straightforward and had a good dialogue with the Puppy Spot representatives at the beginning. We had followed up with a few questions a couple times via the app as instructed and did not receive responses. While it didn't diminish the amazingness of getting our new puppy (who is all that her profile said she was - and more!), it did make us, as first time dog owners, a little more anxious than we needed to be not knowing some of the training progress or her routines until we took her home from the airport.

name: Lakshmi R.
subject: Bernedoodle puppy
message:
The arrangements with puppy spot went great overall. Our bernedoodle had a tiring journey but is now home and happy. The experience with puppy spot was great overall with some minor issues. I was able to pick the puppy I wanted online and the purchase portion experience was great- no complaints. The updates following that were ok and I was able to connect with a manager but they didn’t have all the answers with respect to the travel and photo updates etc . I was given a travel date and it took three phone calls and many texts to figure out that that was the earliest date they had and if I didn’t accept it- things would get pushed back ( no idea why..)
But our puppy is home and we are happy.

name: Iris M.
subject: Finding a puppy through Puppy
message: Finding a puppy through Puppy Spot is easy as there is a great selection from breeders with whom they have strong established relationships. I had been placed on waiting lists from other puppy sites and had been waiting a year when I decided to go through Puppy Spot. What is difficult is that you have to act fast if you find a puppy you are interested as the puppies get bought quickly. Once you place a payment, the process is easy. Puppy Spot walked me through the process, were readily available to answer any questions, kept me abreast of any updates on my puppy and I had access to videos and photos that were uploaded by the breeder while I awaited my puppy's arrival to our home. Puppy Spot also ensures that the puppy or dog you purchase has a medical exam and some shots before they get placed into your care.

name: Jerri J.
subject: The Maltipoo was coughing immediately
message: The Maltipoo was coughing immediately after we received her by the breeder. The breeder was very concerned and has connected with us with concern because of her other puppies too! We drove to pick her up at the breeders from our home in Texas. We stopped in Little Rock, Arkansas to see a veterinarian because she was wheezing besides coughing. The vet put her on medication and also the second puppy we picked up since they were together. She had been and so has our other puppy on medication since the day after we picked her up! The breeders have kept in contact with us, which was very caring!

name: Brian M.
subject: Experience was outstanding, however! The
message: Experience was outstanding, however! The personalized dog tags did not arrive.

name: Hewitt W.
subject: Getting my new Rottweiler
message: It's been a great experience working with the people on puppy spot good Communication,great responses, lovable people thank you for all you do keep up the good work

name: Priyanka V.
subject: Easy and professional interaction. Smooth
message: Easy and professional interaction. Smooth service.

name: Joseph D.
subject: We were very satisfied with
message: We were very satisfied with the Puppy Spot process. While the travel arrangements changed quite a bit over the process due to heat bans and airline schedules, the Puppy Spot people kept us updated the entire time. I learned a lot about the process and in the end, I am completely convinced that the health and welfare of the puppies is Puppy Spot's main concern. While we had to wait until our puppy was 14 weeks of age before it was safe enough for her to travel, now that she is here, we are extremely happy at all the precautions that were taken to get her to us safely and healthy. Thank you Puppy Spot

name: Elizabeth H. P.
subject: Our pup is awesome !
message:
Our pup is awesome !
The process was actually quit simple and straightforward. Lots of people and information to help along the way. The puppy box had so much good and helpful items to make the first few days easier.
We were a bit taken back by the amount of dogs in the van that brought our pup from Missouri. Also our pup had been treated for worms/Gardia prior to being sent and we were not told- found out when we got home and had a time to read over the paper work. The treatment had not cleared him so we had to do another round for the pup but also for our other dog.

name: Sylvie P.
subject: Our wonderful new puppy
message: We had a great experience with our cockapoo puppy, she is happy, full of energy, adapted right away to her new environment and gave us lots of love from the minute she arrived. The whole experience with puppy spot was positive, the only negative was that the airline carrier had been used previously and was not cleaned properly. The puppy was on a clean pad but the bottom of the crate had old pieces of papers stuck to it and just didn’t look clean. For the price and the health of such a young puppy I would have expected a new crate!

name: Kristin Z.
subject: The best experience
message: Truly....the best experience. The peace of mind we received from using PuppySpot was invaluable. We are so pleased with our newest family member. She is healthy and happy. It is clear that she came from a responsible, caring breeder. The support from PuppySpot is much appreciated. We would not have our sweet puppy without PuppySpot.

name: Angela L.
subject: New family addition - Rowdy
message: Incredible experience. Very informative and helpful through the whole process. Highly recommend if your looking for the puppy of your dreams.

name: Irene J.
subject: The people were very nice
message: The people were very nice and helpful but my dog was very sick 5 days after I hot her she had parasites and my vet bill was 400..not so happy about that after spending 4400

name: Blythe Anne L.
subject: Beautiful Golden Retriever ~ Autumn
message:
Puppy Spot stole my heart. I will recommend Puppy Spot to everyone that is interested in finding their perfect companion.
Our new puppy arrived happy, clean and healthy....a little hungry and thirsty but was quick to snuggle after her long trip and a almost a can of wet food! From Start to Finish, stellar organization!!

name: MaryAlaine B.
subject: Great customer service and communication.
message: Great customer service and communication. The whole process was very easy. Our dog is a perfect and happy dog.

name: Kerry T.
subject: Was very hesitant to purchase
message: Was very hesitant to purchase our new family member online, but fell in love with Kady (Dixie). Was very pleased with the whole process. Communication was great from Day 1 with Puppy Spot. Updated me every step. Had to wait 12 weeks cause Kady is so small. American Airlines was fantastic and was able to track her the whole way. Was extremely impressed with her breeder who expressed shipped they day before her arrival some of the dog food she was eating, vitamins, her favorite dog toy and a couple teething chews as well as a binder with all her paperwork and numerous pictures. She also left her contact information so that we could message any questions or concerns we might have. Kady has numerous toys now but her favorite and one she sleeps with is the one sent from her breeder.

name: Joao F.
subject: Happy first time dog owners
message: Great experience, everything was so smooth from choosing our little one to receiving him. I totally recommend puppy spot!

name: Nithish R.
subject: Amazing puppy-centric approach
message: Excellent experience. Care of the puppy was kept at the center of it. Thank you for helping us add an amazing member to the family. Grateful for it!

name: Jessica G.
subject: We love Bruno!
message: Everyone we talked to was very helpful, the puppy arrived in good condition, everything we expected. We were happy with the service. We love our little Bruno.

name: Jeffrey K.
subject: It was overall a good
message: It was overall a good experience. They were all very helpful. I love my new puppy and look forward to years of bonding.

name: Chris E.
subject: Angel the Puppy Spot representative
message: Angel the Puppy Spot representative kept in contact throughout the purchasing to dleivery!

name: Lori P.
subject: Puppy love!
message: Our new puppy truly is a bundle of joy. She was delivered by her chaperone who took excellent care of her. The puppy has a wonderful disposition. Very playful, very sweet. She had no trouble adapting to her new home which was wonderful.

name: Carlos R.
subject: Amazing cut and wash
message:
amazing cut and wash on my new puppy!
thank you very much, I went ahead and booked another future appt.

name: Santos P.
subject: Found our best friend and
message: Found our best friend and perfect fit for the family with an easy process. Thanks to puppy spot we now have a friend for our other dog!

name: Nuno F.
subject: If you're interested on getting
message: If you're interested on getting a puppy this is the best place for an easy smooth transaction

name: Carol K.
subject: The whole process was very
message: The whole process was very good. I just wish when puppy arrived there was a note from the people who watched puppy stating a little about him. It would of been a nice touch. Otherwise I love my puppy and was very happy with Brenda who I dealt with.

name: Susan H.
subject: Everything went smoothly till it
message: Everything went smoothly till it was getting close for my puppy to come home. No communication on my fur babies travel no one bothered to tell me she wasn’t coming home on the day she was scheduled. Once her flight was confirmed things were good my chaperone for my baby was awesome.

subject: Superior puppy,, superior service
message: Superior puppy,, superior service

subject: Everything went smoothly she arrived
message: Everything went smoothly she arrived on time.

name: Lani D.
subject: Everything Puppyspot did was top
message: Everything Puppyspot did was top notch! My only complaint is the breeder did not provide enough food to help transition to new food.

name: Hugh H.
subject: We had a wonderful experience
message: We had a wonderful experience with our purchase of Sophia, now named Winnie due to a duplicate Sophia granddaughter’s previous naming! Winnie has fast become a major member of our family with the sweetest disposition and tremendous enthusiasm. The whole process has been a pleasure .

name: Robert B.
subject: Golden doodle
message: The entire process was really straight forward and simple. Everyone I speak to at puppy spot is really nice and really knowledgeable about the process. Thank you for all the help! Benito is an amazing addition to our family.

subject: This is the best site
message:
This is the best site to buy a puppy
We are very happy with our little Beagle
I recommend this place , it's a little expensed but you receive what they offer.

subject: It was a Time when
message: It was a Time when it was confusing when I was going to get my puppy and where but I’m very pleased with her health and personality. She is great but your prices are a little high.

name: Lynne H.
subject: Love this company
message: My experience with PuppySpot was just amazing. Everyone was so kind and knowledgeable. All questions were answered and I was given up to date information about my puppy. My puppy was driven to my town by two very nice men. She was healthy and happy. Her care was exceptional. I would recommend PuppySpot to anyone looking for a happy, healthy puppy.

name: Brooke G.
subject: We love our girl
message: We are in love with our girl. She is so well adjusted and not afraid of anything. She is so smart and sensitive to the needs of each of our family members. Shipping was easy. I am very happy with how it turned out.

name: Sherri M.
subject: Our little boy
message: Wow I had the feeling in my heart that this was a good business and I was right!! We love our little boy so much!! And is he ever so cute too. Thank you very much for making everything so smooth.

name: Bonnie M.
subject: He’s been the perfect new
message: He’s been the perfect new addition to our home.

name: Krista F.
subject: Everything went very well and
message:
Everything went very well and our new puppy is perfect. I also loved that the breeder contacted me after we got him to ask if everything was going well. You should encourage all your breeders to do that! 

The only issue I had is that I wasn’t aware our puppy would be shipped without a chauffeur like our first puppy purchased through puppyspot was. I was very worried about him traveling alone via American Airlines.

name: Maryann M.
subject: The experience was my first
message: The experience was my first time and great. Elena is now named Molly. She is doing great. We love her and she gets along great with the other dogs. Her and Maggie play all day long. Thank you for all your help.

name: Sean M.
subject: Butters
message: From deciding which puppy to get to picking him up at the airport PuppySpot was incredibly amazing.. my family and I thank you very much .. butters is awesome.. we love him .. definitely would and have recommended PuppySpot to anyone looking for any type of puppy..

name: Gayle P.
subject: The airport at which my
message: The airport at which my puppy was to arrive should have been explained properly in that I mean I was given the incorrect airport .I did my due diligence and followed through on last minute details and found that I was given the incorrect airport during my first correspondence. Otherwise my experience was quite nice and my puppy is more than I could have dreamed.

name: Miriam R.
subject: PuppySpot was a terrific organization
message: PuppySpot was a terrific organization from which to adopt our puppy. This is the second time we have used them and both dogs are beautiful, smart and healthy. The breeders clearly love their puppies and even help poddy train them before they come home to us. The travel partner was terrific as well. I would definitely use them again!!

name: Antonio B.
subject: I was very satisfied as
message: I was very satisfied as well as impressed with PuppySpot. Me and disco have fun with the family.

name: Julie P.
subject: It was good.
message: It was good.

name: Rickee E.
subject: Thank you so much Duke
message: Thank you so much Duke you know him as Astro. Is a perfect fit for us. We are so happy with him. He is really smart. He knows how to sit, shake hand, lay down, and most important no..... he also knows how to go and lay down. He loves to play he has more toys than I think my grand son has lol...he can fetch real well. He also is real good on his Leitch he stays right with you as your walking. He has gotten to be real big since I got him.

name: Brenda C.
subject: I found the love of
message: I found the love of my life wit you! Perfect delivery and a magnificent little toy red poodle full of personality! Thanks so much!

name: Larry S.
subject: Wonderfull puppy.
message: Wonderfull puppy.

name: Nicole R.
subject: We love our new puppy
message:
We love our new puppy and the support received from PuppySpot was excellent. 

I think it would be helpful to have a bit more info from the breeder about the puppy ie potty training, crate training, feeding schedule etc.

name: Laura C.
subject: We are delighted with the
message: We are delighted with the service that we received from everyone at PuppySpot. From our puppy advisor Tiffany to the transportation coordinators and our puppy chaperone Dwight. The app was super helpful. We also appreciated the care articles and past and current photos. Everything was amazing and we love our new for baby so much. We’re so grateful for everything all of you did to help bring him home to us. Highly recommend.

name: Lorraine A A.
subject: The experience was great, I
message:
The experience was great, I loved the app and the updates a long the way. We received our puppy as planned and she is a wonderful addition to our family. Thank you puppy spot for such a nice smooth journey.
Lorraine aiello

name: Karen S.
subject: We love our puppy from
message: We love our puppy from Puppyspot!! She is absolutely beautiful, sweet and a precious little girl ❤️‼️ Thank you for helping us get our labradoodle!!

name: RayLene H.
subject: It was just fine, but
message: It was just fine, but my poor puppy had ears infections. He was in pain for a while.

name: John H.
subject: good
message: good

name: Karen G.
subject: Sarge the Lab
message: Using Puppy Spot to look for a puppy was amazing. The staff is really knowledgeable and the communication was terrific! You do get a lot for what you pay for! Thank you Puppy Spot for helping my family find Sarge! We love him!

name: Teri S.
subject: We love our Sheldon.
message: We love our Sheldon.

name: BETH N.
subject: Great experience
message: I’m very happy with the entire experience of getting my puppy through Puppy Spot. Everyone was extremely helpful throughout the entire process. I was always kept informed about everything that was happening. I can’t thank everyone and the breeders enough! I love my new buddy!

name: Lisa E.
subject: Oh Lucy…
message: She is so wonderful and smart. Lucy loves to talk and I love the way she moves her head side ways when your talking to her. Lucy and my cat love to play together. She is such a joy to have.

name: Richard R.
subject: A new member of our family !
message: We received our puppy in a smooth organized fashion. The puppy arrived in a crate (supposed to be crate trained) but he will not go into the crate voluntarily. He is smart and beautiful but is resisting efforts to potty train and chewing anything other than his doggy chew toys. I have already introduced several friends who never heard of Puppyspot, to your website to browse.

name: Dawn M D.
subject: Faith Marie
message: Couldn't of asked for more professional people. They were compassionate and kind and had so much empathy for our situation. I lost my dog of 11 and 1/2 years went online to find a new baby. I was scammed out of money and a puppy and treated so horribly. When I found puppyspot. They were wonderful and helping me find my new baby Faith Marie. From the start to the finish they were so helpful. Compassionate, knowledgeable all around, Great company to deal with. I highly recommend if you're going to get a puppy you should go to PuppySpot.

name: Satish B.
subject: All well organized
message: All well organized

name: Robert C.
subject: Beyond happy!
message: This dog has the best temperament and easy going personality. Friendly and well behaved too! Kudos to the breeder for such a great dog

name: Kristine G.
subject: Our dog is doing great!
message: Our dog is doing great! He is a lover and a great family dog. My only issue is when he arrived he was very dirty and muddy. He also had a slight case of kennel cough. But otherwise he is great!

name: Donna D.
subject: My bichon is a delight!
message: My bichon is a delight!

name: Robyn B.
subject: Great experience. I asked a
message: Great experience. I asked a lot of questions and the team was very responsive. My Trixy is amazing! happy and healthy. Would use Pet spot again!

name: Barbara A.
subject: Was pleasantly surprised at how
message: Was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to get a puppy. They were very good at keeping me apprised of his growth, and anything that pertained to him. I appreciate all of this. And the delivery was wonderful as well.

name: VICTOR F.
subject: My baby Dash
message:
My baby Dash
My baby Dash arrived to LAX safe, Happy, and on time.
I was very happy to see my new puppy for the first time. 
Dash has been with me for four weeks now and I am completely satisfied with my puppy. 
Thank you Puppyspot for making my life complete. I will recommend Puppyspot to anyone. At Puppyspot they are knowledgeable and professional people.

name: Suzanne M.
subject: We love, love, love our
message: We love, love, love our puppy, Lily Stella!!! She has brought such joy into our home in the 2 weeks she has been with us. She loves our family, talking car rides with Mom, and long walks to get Starbucks’ pup cups! Thank you, Puppy Spot, for bringing us together!

name: Jaime R.
subject: New Pup / Delivery Process
message: My experience was overall good! Once my puppy was reserved and I was at the point of arranging my pup's delivery to my home, I wish I could have spoken to a person to do this. I don't like the APP for this part of the transaction and would have preferred more of a voice in delivery since I was paying for it.

name: Sarah K.
subject: She is seriously the best
message: She is seriously the best dog ever. She is so kind and loving and always so happy.

name: Bernadette F.
subject: My Daisy (Paisley)
message: Very happy with my Dachshund puppy and was confident with Puppyspot. She arrived safely and is settling in nicely.

name: Peter G.
subject: My new English Sheepdog is
message: My new English Sheepdog is amazing! Thank you PuppySpot for doing a great job!

name: Sheila S.
subject: Travel coordination needs improvement
message: Love, love, love Yogi (fka, “Gray”) and the initiation of the process, intake call, etc was absolutely wonderful. However, I was told that I would hear from a travel coordinator to arrange travel. I received an email on a Monday that the puppy would be arriving that Thursday, pending my confirmation. I was out of town, responded to the email that I wouldn’t be home until Friday, and sent a text with the same detail. On Thursday, while traveling for work, I received a call from the pet transport company saying they were at my house. Not sure where the disconnect was, they told me someone needed to come retrieve the puppy within 15 min or they would have to ship him back to WI and re-deliver the following week. I scrambled to find someone to drive across town midday to retrieve him. Not the best experience or communication, but Yogi is amazing and brings joy everyday.

name: Christopher D.
subject: My wife and I were
message: My wife and I were Leary on getting a puppy through a website after being scammed before. We lost $2600.00 trying to get a puppy and he never came. Puppy spot was on point and made us very comfortable in purchasing our new baby. We are now a complete family. We can't thank you enough!!!

name: Donna B.
subject: would have giving a 5
message: would have giving a 5 but the travel plans change on your part you should kept the plans you made then stop it, but if not for Will Bravo i would have not taken the dog but he made it as pain free as he could so the dog is home another thing the breeder send a dog that was matted and had a order they should take better care of the dogs going at least give them a bath.

name: Tim & Carol S.
subject: Thank you.
message: Nothing but good things to say about the entire process. Thank you.

subject: Great Service from Puppyspot
message: I have a beautiful puppy, Freyja from Puppyspot. Great service all round. Good support and a great Puppyspot welcome pack. Very pleased.
